title: fvContent
description: This is the content part of Framevuerk.

prop.name: initialScroll
prop.description: Initial scrollTop position of component in px. (will apply after all child components mounts)

note: You should put fvContent directly into fvMain for best style matching.
In framevuerk, there is no window or body scroll event happens at all. So if you want to listen to scroll events and etc, listen to this element instead of window or body.
